…threatened.  Just hours before that announcement, there were posts on social media.  I don't need to recount all of that now, and we don't know exactly who  had advance notice of that decision or whether anybody acted on it, but  that is exactly the problem.

Americans should never ever have to wonder if public officials are  using any sort of inside knowledge…
